text: Trevor Winkfield (born 1944) is a British-born artist and writer. Winkfield was born in Leeds, England in 1944. He studied at the Leeds College of Art. He received an M. A. from the Royal College of Art in London. He moved from London to New York City in 1969. He is connected to the New York School of poets and painters. Critic John Yau has said, "He never bought into the idea that art should be universal, on the surface, or understood immediately." ==References== ==Other websites== * Winkfield at Tibor de Nagy Gallery * Winkfield at Artsy.net * Winkfield at Foundation for Contemporary Arts Category:British artists Category:Writers from Yorkshire Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: Trevor Winkfield
